In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceed. Provide an example

Here is the Julia code for the `wrap_string` function:
```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(str, " ")
    current_line = ""
    result = ""

    for word in words
        if length(current_line + word) <= text_width
            current_line *= "$current_line $word "
        else
            result *= "$current_line\n"
            current_line = word
        end
    end

    result *= current_line
    return result
end
```
Example usage:
```julia
julia> wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean elementum vestibulum mauris at hendrerit.")
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit\n amet, consec\n tetur adipisc\n ing elit.\n Aenean elemen\n tum vestibu\n larium mauri\n sat hendr\n erit."
```
